short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to record and save user actions for accessiBe's accessFlow solution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the accessFlow Chrome Extension â€“ a cutting-edge solution that enhances web accessibility for developers. Seamlessly integrate this extension with your existing accessFlow license and unlock the power to record user actions and interactions. The extension captures and save actions in a format that accessFlow can then execute and audit.

Based on the ADA and WCAG guidelines, accessFlow scans and monitors your recorded sessions for accessibility errors. By capturing user actions and UI workflows, the extension enables accessFlow to run automatic audits on these steps, ensuring a seamless and accurate evaluation of your website's accessibility.

Effortlessly fix any issues with our suggested code snippets, conveniently categorized by severity level, to help ensure your website is accessible to all users.
